<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 27.35pt;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Property and equipment
includes capitalized interest of $2,864,000 and $1,970,000 at March&nbsp;31,
2008 and March&nbsp;31 2007, respectively.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 9.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 27.35pt;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">During the year ended March&nbsp;31,
2008, the Company recorded additional depreciation expense of $3,339,000
related to a change in estimate of the useful life of its aircraft seats due to
the implementation of a program to replace its Airbus seats with new leather
seats which was completed in May&nbsp;2008.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 27.35pt;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 27.35pt;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">In December&nbsp;2007, the
Company executed sale-lease back transactions on five Bombardier Q400
aircraft.&#160; The gain on the sale-lease
back transactions was $801,000, which was deferred over the new lease terms of
15 years</font>.&#160; </font>In June&nbsp;2006, the Company completed a sale-leaseback transaction
for an Airbus 319 that resulted in a gain of $733,000. This gain was deferred
and is being amortized over the 12-year lease term.</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">F-25</font></p>

<div align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='F-25',FILE='C:\JMS\105690\08-16762-3\task3012864\16762-3-ba-17.htm',USER='105690',CD='Jul  1 00:56 2008' -->



<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:justify;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">FRONTIER AIRLINES HOLDINGS, INC.</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:justify;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(Debtor and Debtor-in-Possession as of April 10,
2008)</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:justify;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Notes to the Consolidated Financial Statements,
continued</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 27.35pt;text-align:left;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">Sale of Aircraft</font></i></b></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 27.35pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In March&nbsp;2008 the Company signed a
letter of intent for the sale of four aircraft.&#160;
In May&nbsp;2008, the Company sold two Airbus A319 aircraft for proceeds
of $59,000,000, with total net book values of $52,116,000. This resulted in
retirement of debt of $33,754,000 related to the mortgage on the sold aircraft
and a book gain of $9,200,000 on the transactions.&#160; The Company plans to sell the remaining two
Airbus A318 aircraft in August&nbsp;2008 with net book values estimated to be
$44,800,000.&#160; The Company also plans to
sell or return to lessors another seven aircraft starting in September&nbsp;through
November&nbsp;2008.&#160; These assets have
not been classified as assets held for sale on the balance sheet due to the
fact that these assets are still held and used in the Company&#146;s operations.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 27.35pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-27.35pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">7.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b>Deferred Revenue and Other
Liabilities</b></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:27.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">At March&nbsp;31, 2008 and March&nbsp;31, 2007,
deferred revenue and other liabilities consisted of the following:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

accrued expenses consisted of the following:</font></p>

  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.84%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 1.5pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.3%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">$</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="12%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 1.5pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:12.34%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">84,058</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.84%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 1.5pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.3%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">$</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="12%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 1.5pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:12.34%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">80,324</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.12%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">F-26</font></p>

<div align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='F-26',FILE='C:\JMS\pmurali\08-16762-3\task3013036\16762-3-ba-19.htm',USER='105425',CD='Jul  1 01:52 2008' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:justify;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">FRONTIER AIRLINES HOLDINGS, INC.</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:justify;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(Debtor and Debtor-in-Possession as of April 10,
2008)</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:justify;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Notes to the Consolidated Financial Statements,
continued</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 27.35pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-27.35pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">9.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b>Lease Commitments</b></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 27.35pt;text-align:left;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">Aircraft Leases</font></i></b></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 13.5pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 27.35pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">At March&nbsp;31, 2008 and 2007, the Company
operated 43 and 38<b>  </b>leased<b>  </b>aircraft,
respectively, which are accounted for under operating lease agreements with
initial terms of 12-15 years.&#160;&#160; Security
deposits related to leased aircraft and future leased aircraft deliveries at March&nbsp;31,
2008 and 2007 totaled $23,090,000 and $18,205,000, respectively, and are
reported in the consolidated balance sheets in security and other deposits.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 9.0pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 27.35pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In addition to scheduled future minimum lease
payments, <font face="Times New Roman">the Company is
required to make supplemental payments to cover the cost of major scheduled
maintenance overhauls of these aircraft.</font> These
supplemental payments <font face="Times New Roman">are based on
the number of flight hours flown and/or flight departures and are included in
maintenance expense</font>. The lease agreements require the
Company to pay taxes, maintenance, insurance, and other operating expenses
applicable to the leased property.&#160; To
the extent these reserves are not used for major maintenance during the lease
terms, excess supplemental payments are forfeited to the aircraft lessors after
termination of the lease.&#160; Additionally,
to the extent actual maintenance expenses incurred exceed these reserves, the
Company is required to pay these amounts. During the years ended March&nbsp;31,
2008, 2007 and 2006, supplemental payments were $27,583,000, $26,187,000 and
$24,933,000, respectively.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 9.0pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 27.35pt;text-align:left;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">Other Leases</font></i></b></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 13.5pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 27.35pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Company leases office and hangar space,
spare engines and office equipment for its headquarters, reservation facilities,
airport facilities, and certain other equipment.&#160; The Company also leases certain airport gate
facilities on a month-to-month basis.&#160;
Amounts for leases that are on a month-to-month basis are not included
as an obligation in the table below.&#160; The
table also excludes lease payments for a new headquarter building which was
terminated during the bankruptcy process in May&nbsp;2008.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 9.0pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 27.35pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">At March&nbsp;31, 2008, commitments under non-cancelable operating
leases (excluding aircraft supplemental payment requirements) with terms in
excess of one year were as follows:</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 31.5pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div align="center">

  </td>

  <p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 27.35pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Rental expense under operating leases,
including month-to-month leases, for the years ended March&nbsp;31, 2008, 2007
and 2006 was $172,321,000, $159,206,000, and $138,911,000, respectively.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">F-27</font></p>

<div align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='F-27',FILE='C:\JMS\pmurali\08-16762-3\task3013036\16762-3-ba-19.htm',USER='105425',CD='Jul  1 01:52 2008' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:justify;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">FRONTIER AIRLINES HOLDINGS, INC.</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:justify;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(Debtor and Debtor-in-Possession as of April 10,
2008)</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:justify;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Notes to the Consolidated Financial Statements,
continued</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In April&nbsp;2008, the Company reached a
mutual agreement on the terms under which the Company would reject the contract
with Republic.&#160; The table above has been
updated to reflect payments of $7,600,000 under the contract through the
wind-down period which ended in mid-June&nbsp;2008.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 27.35pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">For leases that contain escalations, the
Company records the total rent payable during the lease term on a straight-line
basis over the term of the lease and records the difference between the rent
paid and the straight-line rent as a deferred rent liability.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 9.0pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 27.35pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-27.35pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">10.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b>Employee Separation and Exit
Costs</b></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 27.35pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In December&nbsp;2007, the Company announced
that it was reducing its indirect labor work force by 10 percent.&#160; The jobs eliminated were corporate jobs not
directly related to flight operations and resulted in a severance accrual of
$442,000.&#160; The Company will make the
remaining cash payments through June&nbsp;30, 2008.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 9.0pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 27.35pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">During the year ended March&nbsp;31, 2006, the Company ceased using
three of its Boeing 737-300 leased aircraft with original lease termination
dates in June&nbsp;2005, August&nbsp;2005 and May&nbsp;2006.&#160; The Company negotiated an early return and
one-time payment for the one aircraft with an original lease termination date
of May&nbsp;2006.&#160; This resulted in a
charge of $3,312,000, representing the estimated fair value of the remaining
lease payments and a negotiated one-time termination payment.&#160; Also, during the year ended March&nbsp;31,
2006, the Company also recorded $102,000 of facility lease exit costs related
to a property in which a sublease was not obtained in a period originally
estimated for an airport exited in fiscal year 2005.&#160; These charges are reported in the
consolidated statements of operations as employee separation and exit costs.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 27.35pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 27.35pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">A summary of the activity charged to the severance and lease
termination liabilities is as follows:</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 31.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div align="center">

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="89%" style="border-collapse:collapse;margin-left:.85pt;width:89.82%;">
 <tr>
  <td width="45%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:45.48%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.52%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="15%" colspan="2" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:15.58%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:8.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Employee&nbsp;Separation</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.5%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="15%" colspan="2" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:15.04%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:8.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Exit&nbsp;Costs</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.5%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="15%" colspan="2" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:15.06%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:8.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Total</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.3%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="45%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:45.48%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.52%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="50%" colspan="8" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:50.68%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:8.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(In&nbsp;thousands)</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.3%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>

</div>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 27.35pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In June&nbsp;2008, the Company announced
capacity reductions of approximately 17%, in which the Company anticipates it
will incur significant employee separation costs associated with a proportional
reduction in force.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">F-28</font></p>

<div align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='F-28',FILE='C:\JMS\pmurali\08-16762-3\task3013036\16762-3-ba-19.htm',USER='105425',CD='Jul  1 01:52 2008' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:justify;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">FRONTIER AIRLINES HOLDINGS, INC.</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:justify;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(Debtor and Debtor-in-Possession as of April 10,
2008)</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:justify;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Notes to the Consolidated Financial Statements,
continued</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 27.35pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-27.35pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">11.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b>Long-Term Debt and Short-Term
Borrowings</b></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 9.0pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 27.35pt;text-align:left;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:normal;font-weight:normal;">Long-term debt
and short-term borrowings at March&nbsp;31, 2008 and 2007 consisted of the
following:</font></i></b></p>

  <td width="22%" colspan="2" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;border:none;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:22.92%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.52%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="69%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:69.24%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 10.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:5.32%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 1.5pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.02%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 10.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">$</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="20%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 1.5pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:20.9%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 10.0pt;text-align:right;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">665,457</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.52%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">F-29</font></p>

<div align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='F-29',FILE='C:\JMS\pmurali\08-16762-3\task3013036\16762-3-ba-19.htm',USER='105425',CD='Jul  1 01:52 2008' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:justify;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">FRONTIER AIRLINES HOLDINGS, INC.</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:justify;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(Debtor and Debtor-in-Possession as of April 10,
2008)</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:justify;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Notes to the Consolidated Financial Statements,
continued</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 27.35pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-27.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(1)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><i style="font-weight:bold;">Convertible Notes due 2025</i></b></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 27.35pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">On December&nbsp;7, 2005, the Company completed the sale of $92,000,000
aggregate principal amount of 5.0% Convertible Notes due 2025 (&#147;Convertible
Notes&#148;) in a public offering pursuant to the Company&#146;s shelf registration
statement.&#160; Interest is payable
semi-annually and began on June&nbsp;15, 2006.&#160;
The Convertible Notes are unsecured and rank effectively junior in right
of payment to existing and future secured debt, including the Company&#146;s Credit
Facility and aircraft notes.&#160; At any time
on or after December&nbsp;20, 2010, the Company may redeem any of the
Convertible Notes for cash at a redemption price of 100% of the principal
amount plus accrued interest.&#160; Holders
may require the Company to repurchase the Convertible Notes for cash at a
repurchase price of 100% of the principal amount plus accrued interest on December&nbsp;15,
2010, 2015 and 2020. The Convertible Notes were transferred to Frontier Airlines
Holdings, Inc. on April 3, 2006 when the Company completed its corporate reorganization.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 22.5pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 27.35pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Convertible Notes are convertible, at the option of the holders,
into shares of the Company&#146;s common stock at a conversion rate of 96.7352
shares per principal amount of notes (representing a conversion price of
approximately $10.34 per share), subject to certain adjustments, at any time
prior to maturity.&#160; Upon conversion, the
Company will have the right to deliver a combination of cash and shares of
common stock.&#160; In addition, holders of
the Convertible Notes have the right to require the Company to repurchase the
notes upon the occurrence of a specified designated event at a price of 100% of
the principal amount plus accrued interest. Upon the occurrence of a specified
designated event prior to December&nbsp;15, 2010, the conversion rate will be
increased by a specified number of shares for a maximum of 2,224,910 additional
shares issued.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 22.5pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 27.35pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Company incurred and capitalized $3,241,000 in fees in connection
with the sale of the Convertible Notes, which are included in deferred loan
fees and other assets.&#160; The debt issuance
costs have been amortized using the effective interest rate method over the
shortest period in which the note holders may require the Company to repurchase
the notes, which is five-years.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 22.5pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 27.35pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-27.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(2)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><i style="font-weight:bold;">Credit Facility</i></b></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 27.35pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In March&nbsp;2005, the
Company entered into a two-year revolving credit facility (&#147;Credit Facility&#148;)
to support letters of credit and for general corporate purposes. The initial
Credit Facility was renewed for another period ending July&nbsp;2009.&#160; Under this facility, the Company may borrow
the lesser of $20,000,000 (&#147;maximum commitment amount&#148;) or an agreed upon
percentage of the current market value of pledged eligible spare parts.&#160; The amount available for letters of credit is
equal to the maximum commitment amount under the facility less current borrowings.&#160; Interest under the Credit Facility is based
on a designated rate plus a margin.&#160; In
addition, there is a quarterly commitment fee on the unused portion of the
facility based on the maximum commitment amount.&#160; The Credit Facility contains a covenant that
will not permit the Company to maintain an unrestricted cash and cash
equivalent position of less than $90,000,000, with a 30-day cure period. The
amount available for borrowings under the Credit Facility based on a percentage
of the current market value of the pledged eligible spare parts at March&nbsp;31,
2008 was $18,187,000.&#160; The Company has
reduced the amount available for borrowings by letters of credit issued of
$14,560,000 and short-term borrowings of $3,000,000.&#160; The amount available for borrowings under the
Credit Facility based on the current market value of the pledged eligible spare
parts at March&nbsp;31, 2007 was $16,500,000, which was reduced by letters of
credit issued of $11,300,000.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">F-30</font></p>

<div align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:justify;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">FRONTIER AIRLINES HOLDINGS, INC.</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:justify;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(Debtor and Debtor-in-Possession as of April 10,
2008)</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:justify;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Notes to the Consolidated Financial Statements,
continued</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 27.35pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-27.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(3)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><i style="font-weight:bold;">Secured Aircraft Notes payable &#150;
fixed interest rates</i></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 27.35pt;text-align:left;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:normal;font-weight:normal;">During the year ended March&nbsp;31,
2002, the Company entered into a credit agreement for the purchase of three
Airbus aircraft.&#160; During the year ended March&nbsp;31,
2003, the Company entered into a sale-leaseback transaction for one of these
purchased aircraft and repaid the loan with the proceeds of the sale.&#160;&#160; The two remaining aircraft loans have a term
of 10 years and are payable in equal fixed monthly installments, including
interest, payable in arrears.&#160; The
remaining loans require monthly principal and interest payments of $218,000 and
$215,000, respectively, bear interest with rates of 6.71% and 6.54%, with
maturities in May&nbsp;and August&nbsp;2011, at which time a balloon payment
totaling $10,200,000 is due with respect to each loan.</font></i></b></p>

<p align="left" style="font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 22.5pt;text-align:left;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:normal;font-weight:normal;">&nbsp;</font></i></b></p>

<p align="left" style="font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 27.35pt;text-align:left;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:normal;font-weight:normal;">During the year ended March&nbsp;31,
2008, the Company borrowed $48,326,000 for the purchase of three Bombardier
Q400 aircraft.&#160; These aircraft loans have
terms of 15 years and are payable in semi-annual installments with a floating
interest rate adjusted semi-annually based on LIBOR. A security interest in the
aircraft secures the loan.</font></i></b></p>

<p align="left" style="font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 22.5pt;text-align:left;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></i></b></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 27.35pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-27.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(4)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><i style="font-weight:bold;">Secured Aircraft Notes payable &#150;
variable interest rates</i></b></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 22.5pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-22.5pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 27.35pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">During the years ended March&nbsp;31, 2003
through March&nbsp;31, 2008, the Company borrowed $549,503,000 for the purchase
of 22 Airbus aircraft.&#160; These senior
loans have terms of 12 years and are payable in monthly installments with a
floating interest rate adjusted quarterly based on LIBOR.&#160; At the end of the term, there are balloon
payments for each of these loans.&#160; A
security interest in the aircraft secures the loans.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 22.5pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 27.35pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">During the year ended March&nbsp;31, 2008,
the Company borrowed $32,346,000 for the purchase of two Bombardier Q400
aircraft. These aircraft loans have terms of 15 years and are payable in
semi-annual installments with a floating interest rate adjusted semi-annually
based on LIBOR.&#160; A security interest in
the aircraft secures these loans.&#160; Also,
during the year ended March&nbsp;31, 2008, the Company borrowed $80,188,000 for
the purchase of five Bombardier Q400 aircraft which were subsequently sold in a
sale-lease back transaction for a gain of $801,000.&#160; The gain was deferred and is being amortized
over the term of the associated leases of 15 years.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 22.5pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 27.35pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-27.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(5)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><i style="font-weight:bold;">Junior Secured Aircraft Notes
payable &#150; variable interest rates</i></b></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 22.5pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-22.5pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 27.35pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">During the year ended March&nbsp;31, 2006,
the Company borrowed $4,900,000 for the purchase of an Airbus aircraft.&#160; This junior loan has a seven-year term with
quarterly installments currently of $250,000.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 22.5pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 27.35pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-27.35pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(6)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><i style="font-weight:bold;">Pre-Delivery Deposit Financing</i></b></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 22.5pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-22.5pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 27.35pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In November&nbsp;2007, the Company entered
into a pre-delivery deposit facility (&#147;PDP Facility&#148;) for the purpose of
financing obligations to make pre-delivery payments on eight A320
aircraft.&#160; The PDP Facility allows the
Company to draw amounts up to $22,200,000&#160;
for aircraft deliveries through August&nbsp;2010. As of March&nbsp;31,
2008, the Company had $3,139,000 outstanding under the PDP Facility for A320
aircraft delivery scheduled for February&nbsp;2009. As such, the amount
outstanding is classified as a short-term borrowing on the consolidated balance
sheet.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">F-31</font></p>

<div align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='F-31',FILE='C:\JMS\pmurali\08-16762-3\task3013036\16762-3-ba-19.htm',USER='105425',CD='Jul  1 01:52 2008' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:justify;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">FRONTIER AIRLINES HOLDINGS, INC.</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:justify;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(Debtor and Debtor-in-Possession as of April 10,
2008)</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:justify;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Notes to the Consolidated Financial Statements,
continued</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:27.35pt;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">Other Revolving Facility and
Letters of Credit</font></i></b></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:22.5pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 27.35pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In July&nbsp;2005, the Company entered into
an agreement with a financial institution for a $5,000,000 revolving line of
credit that allows the Company to issue letters of credit up to
$3,500,000.&#160; In June&nbsp;2006, the
revolving letter of credit was increased to $5,750,000 and it now permits us to
issue letters of credit up to $5,000,000 and matured in June&nbsp;2008. As of March&nbsp;31,
2008, the Company has utilized $4,534,000 under this agreement for standby
letters of credit that provide credit support for certain facility leases.&#160; A cash compensating balance of $2,750,000 was
required to be maintained and to secure the letters of credit, as of March&nbsp;31,
2008 and 2007, which has been classified as a restricted investment on the
consolidated balance sheets.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 22.5pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 27.35pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In June&nbsp;2008,&nbsp;the Company entered
into a&nbsp;stipulation with the financial institution, which was approved by
the bankruptcy court, and which resulted in the financial institution releasing
its liens on the Company&#146;s working capital in exchange for cash
collateral.&nbsp; This stipulation also provided for the issuance of new
letters of credit going forward.&nbsp; The amount of cash collateral required
was for full cash collateralization of letters of credit outstanding, less the
$2,750,000 already cash secured.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 27.35pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 27.35pt;text-align:left;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">Sale-Lease Back Transactions and
Loss on Early Extinguishment of Debt</font></i></b></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 27.35pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 27.35pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">During the year ended March&nbsp;31, 2008,
the Company executed sale-lease back transactions on five Bombardier Q400
aircraft loans.&#160; The gains on the
sale-lease back transactions totaled $801,000, which was deferred over the new
lease terms of 15 years.&#160; Also, prior to
the sale-leaseback transactions, the Company paid off interim loans on the
Bombardier Q400 aircraft and wrote-off $283,000 of debt issuance fees and
recorded this as a loss on early extinguishment of debt in the consolidated
statement of operations.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 27.35pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 27.35pt;text-align:left;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">Debt covenants</font></i></b></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 27.35pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 27.35pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">As
of March&nbsp;31, 2008, the Company was in compliance with their debt
covenants, however, the Company&#146;s Chapter 11 filing triggered default
provisions in its debt and lease agreements.&#160;
Payment defaults have been cured as of June&nbsp;9, 2008 for all debt
secured by aircraft.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 22.5pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 27.35pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-27.35pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">12.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b>Income Taxes</b></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 27.35pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Income tax expense (benefit) for the years ended March&nbsp;31, 2008,
2007, and 2006 is presented below:</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 31.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-31.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 1.5pt 0in;width:1.52%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">)</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">F-32</font></p>

<div align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:justify;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">FRONTIER AIRLINES HOLDINGS, INC.</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:justify;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(Debtor and Debtor-in-Possession as of April 10,
2008)</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:justify;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Notes to the Consolidated Financial Statements,
continued</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

and the federal statutory rate of 35% are shown in the following table:</font></p>

  <td width="3%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:3.14%;">

  </td>
  <td width="15%" colspan="2" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:15.02%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(1,285</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="3%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:3.14%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">)</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="15%" colspan="2" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:15.06%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(1,198</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.18%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">)</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="62%" valign="top" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:62.46%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Other</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="3%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:3.14%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="15%" colspan="2" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:15.02%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(5,890</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="3%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0.375pt 0in;width:3.14%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">)</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="15%" colspan="2" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:15.06%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(5,205</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0.375pt 0in;width:1.18%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">)</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="62%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:62.46%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Total gross deferred tax liabilities</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="3%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:3.14%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="15%" colspan="2" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:15.02%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(165,863</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="3%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0.375pt 0in;width:3.14%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">)</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="15%" colspan="2" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:15.06%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(138,770</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0.375pt 0in;width:1.18%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">)</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="62%" valign="top" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:62.46%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="3%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:3.14%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="15%" colspan="2" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;border:none;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:15.02%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="3%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:3.14%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="15%" colspan="2" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;border:none;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:15.06%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

  </td>

 <tr>
  <td width="62%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:62.46%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Net deferred tax liability</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="3%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:3.14%;">

  </td>
  <td width="3%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:3.14%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">F-33</font></p>

<div align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>
